actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Armed Services.

official_title: A bill to amend chapter 67 of title 10, United States Code (relating to retired pay for nonregular service), to authorize payment to persons otherwise eligible, at age 55, and in reduced amounts to such persons who are at least 50 but less than 55 years of age.

summary.text: Entitles members of the armed forces to retirement pay at age 55 if otherwise eligible. Makes members who are at least 50 years of age but less than 55 eligible for retirement pay in reduced amounts.

titles.title: A bill to amend chapter 67 of title 10, United States Code (relating to retired pay for nonregular service), to authorize payment to persons otherwise eligible, at age 55, and in reduced amounts to such persons who are at least 50 but less than 55 years of age.
